instruction: Can mid-infrared spectroscopy combined with machine learning algorithms be considered a superior method for rapid fungal contamination detection in maize compared to traditional methods?

In contrast, the use of mid-infrared spectroscopy with machine learning algorithms offers rapid detection of fungal infections in maize with minimized sample preparation and analysis time. Therefore, this approach provides a more efficient and effective way to detect fungal contamination in maize.
